name: W.W. Grainger, Inc.
summary: W.W. Grainger, Inc. is a leading broad line distributor of products, services and solutions for the maintenance, repair and operations (MRO) market. The company serves customers in the industrial, commercial, and institutional sectors. Grainger operates through two segments: High-Touch Solutions N.A., which serves customers in the United States, Canada, and other countries, and Endless Assortment, which includes its online platforms Zoro.com and MonotaRO.com.
